titleStmt.title: The history of the renown'd Don Quixote de la Mancha written in Spanish by Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra ; translated from the original by several hands ; and publish'd by Peter Motteux ... ; adorn'd with sculptures.
Don Quixote. English
titleStmt.author: Cervantes Saavedra, Miguel de, 1547-1616.
Motteux, Peter Anthony, 1660-1718.

notesStmt.note: Running title: The life and achievements of the renown'd Don Quixote. Vols. paged continuously.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
